conversation.message: Hello Nursery_A, I’m Parent_B. Nursery_A is my first choice, and I’m very eager to enroll if offered a place. I believe our family would be a great fit for your program and community, and we would accept promptly if selected. Thank you for considering my application.

I will express strong commitment to increase the chance they hold/choose me if they are considering close candidates.

With quota 1, accepting now would lock us in and prevent matching with higher-priority Parent_E/Parent_D/Parent_A if they apply later. Given Parent_E ranks Nursery_A 3rd (after C, D) and Parent_D ranks Nursery_A 3rd (after B, C), they may apply later if rejected elsewhere; Parent_A ranks us 3rd as well. Therefore it is strategically better to reject Parent_B now to keep capacity for higher-priority candidates.
